February 19 at 10:58 AM ¬∑

WVMS Parents/Guardians:

Walton-Verona Middle School is holding a Reality Store event during the school day on Tuesday, March 3rd here at school. We are still in need of about 20 volunteers to help with the event regardless what grade level your student is in currently.

We are looking for people to run the different tables/booths we have for students to visit such as setting up a bank account, selecting a house, selecting a car, etc. based on the career the student is given.

This is a great event for our 7th graders and hope you or someone you know is willing to help. We do provide lunch for our volunteers. In order to be able to volunteer for this event the adult must have a current background check on file with the board of education. If you do not have one on file you can stop by the board office and fill out the form. The sooner the better so that we can get this back in time for the event.

If you are interested in volunteering please contact our Business Class Teacher, Patrick Luken.
patrick.luken@wv.kyschools.us
